titles: A copy of his Highnesse Prince Charles his letter to the commanders of His Majesties forces. With a copy of His Highnesse commission to Collonell Poyer. Also a letter concerning the state of the kingdome. Written by Mr: Hugh Peters, minister of Gods Word.
author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.
publisher: Printed by Robert Ibbitson, in Smithfield, neer the Queenes-head Tavern,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
